pages.text: The Vicious Inferno Flower grants permanent fire resistance. Additionally, attacking a mob with a non-projectile attack will inflict the Inferno potion effect, which engulfs them in flames which cannot be extinguished by water. When attacking a mob on fire, damage is increased.
$(l)Default Attribute modifiers:$()$(br)$(2)+20%$() Attack Damage (if target is on fire)$(br)
$(o)Not even water can put the flame out
